overview: 3 Gante 30 Dina 30 Second is a Kannada Feature Love Story written and directed by adman G K Madhusudhan. Film is produced by Chandrashekar R Padmashali and like minded producers under the banner Brain Share Creations Pvt Ltd. This is a story of a reality game takes place between the Hero and Heroine! The movie has a blend of youngsters Arun Gowda & Kavya Shetty in lead roles along with powerhouse performers Devaraj, Sudharani, Edakallu Guddada Mele Chandrashekhar, Ramesh Bhat, Anantavelu, T.S.Nagabharana and Gururaj Hosakote.
title: 3 Gante 30 Dina 30 Second
